thread.section_title: Skyline Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very well located.
thread.title_full: Very well located. - Review of Skyline Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Wes_meredith
title: Very well located.
text:
Only a 5 minute walk from 50 St subway, I found this hotel to be very well situated for a 5 night break in New York.
Getting the subway from JFK is only a 40 minute journey (including the walk from 50 St subway) and only costs $5.75.
WIFI is available in the very spacious reception area at nil cost though a cost to access WIFI from the bedroom is added to the bill (if requested).
I stayed in a spacious room with 2 double beds that looked down on to the street. The skyscrapers of 5th avenue could be seen from the room. The bathroom had a nice big mirror and bright lighting and the shower was powerful. A lift is available to access all floors.
The room was cleaned very well each day and the reception staff were very helpful.
I woud
